title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 609.4 - Reimbursable costs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 609.4 - Reimbursable costs

State Regulations

Costs must be allocated or distributed among activities
as instructed by the department. Costs are reimbursable only within the
requirements for particular programs or activities. Portions of costs not
reimbursable within the requirements of an activity to which they have been
classified are not subject to reimbursement in any other classification except
when specifically permitted by the department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
609.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
